keyPolicies.policyTitle: Cracking Down on Crime & Anti-Social Behaviour
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure genuine accountability from police and a zero tolerance policy to crime and anti-social behaviour. Strengthen stop-search, reintroduce anti-yob curfew, and the re-marg program preventing young needlessly from entering the judicial system.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Supporting a Strong NHS You Can Rely On
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The NHS should continue to be valued, prioritised and - what it will do well above 2001 GP access so everyone will be able to see a GP speedily. The demand on our NHS is supported by continuously growing and I will seek more investment to develop heart disease, cancers, hospital service investments in the NHS and that spread across the local workforce the immediate hold.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Delivering a Better Education for Brent's Children
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work with local schools, teachers and parents to ensure quality of opportunity in Brent Central. By putting achievement first, education standards in the community and our schools will rise further.
We must ensure that young people will work to provide incentives for companies to hire in Brent Central.
Champion local businesses and opportunities to attract innovation to Brent while looking for expansion productivity and long-term economic plan.
Work with police and legislators to ensure racial, religious and gender discrimination has no place and intolerance, racism, inequality, that hate crime is driven out of Brent.

issues.economy: A growing local & national economy. A growing economy with record numbers of jobs and rising living standards.
issues.education: Delivering a better education for Brent's children.
issues.health: Supporting a strong NHS you can rely on.

images.caption: For a strong and effective local champion you can trust to deliver for you.
